PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2024/00864--- Address: St Marys CottageChurch HillCarshaltonSM5 3PD--- Proposal: Erection of a single storey side extension with a parapet wall and provision of a rooflight at ground floor, alterations to side fenestration, addition of a side door and alterations to internal layout. Re-pointing external brickwork to all elevations and landscaping of garden including provision of extended patio area.
